main.name: Anton Averin
main.description: specializing in front and backend development (MERN).
main.bio: Always staying tuned in with the latest trends and practices in software development. Clean code believer and follower. Open for remote and relocation options. In my free time I like to travel by car with my family.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: During my studies at University, I learned the basics of teamwork, people management and achieving goals. I successfully apply the acquired knowledge in my current field, thanks to which I successfully communicate and interact with the team at work.

work.title: Javascript Developer
work.description: Development on front-end and back-end programming. Setting up and using Webpack, Unit and E2E testing, Routing, REST API.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
